subject: Dear Uncle John
body:
Dear Uncle John ,

Thanks for your reply. I am sure you can help me. However, I inherited the money from my late father. The funds had been with a bank here in my country as a result of some agreement the bank had with my late father. That i can only claim the money when i am up to 25 years. And if i am not up to 25 years, i should present a guardian who will help me in receiving the money for investment purposes in his or her country. The guardian will be able to manage and invest it in any good business and also help me to move out from here so that I can continue my education which i stopped since my parentâ€™s death.


Below is the major reason why I am contacting you.

(1) To provide a bank account where this money will be transferred to,
(2) To serve as a guardian of this fund since the bank insist that
their agreement with my father was that i provide a foreign partner
before releasing the fund.

My details are below :

Name : Angela Uratta
Address : St Margret boarding school, Abidjan Cote d'ivoire
Age : 18
Profession : student
My Number +225 0585702577

I have seen your bank details but to facilitate this process kindly send me the following details for
submission at the bank for confirmation :

1. Complete Name.........................

2. Complete address....................

3. Telephone number.....................

4. Your age........................... ......

5. occupation..................... ........


Angela Uratta

subject: Re: Dear Uncle John
body:
Hello Angela,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your situation with me. I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your father and the difficulties you're facing. It's a lot for anyone to handle, especially at such a young age.

I understand that you need help managing this inheritance, but I must admit, I'm not very knowledgeable about international banking or investment. However, I'd be happy to learn more about it and see how I can assist you.

Could you please tell me more about the agreement between your father and the bank? Also, what kind of business are you interested in investing in? 

As for my personal details, I'm afraid I can't share them online due to privacy concerns. But rest assured, we can continue our conversation here until we figure out the best way forward.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Dear Uncle John
body:
Dear Uncle John

Thanks so much for your letter. I am so glad about it, I have been through a lot and my wicked uncles have not really help matters. I am currently trying to gain admission into a boarding school in the central district of Abidjan for my o'level exams.

The agreement of my late father had with the bank is that i can only claim the money when i am up to 25 years. And if eventually i am not up to 25 years, i should present a guardian who will help me in receiving the money for investment purposes in his or her country. 

This guardian will be able to manage and invest this fund for me and also help me to move out from here so that I can continue my education 

I am not asking for your personal information for any negative thing. I am just 18. I only need them so i can take them to the bank as it is one of the things they ask me to bring from the guardian 

1. Complete Name.........................

2. Complete address....................

3. Telephone number.....................

4. Your age........................... ......

5. occupation..................... ........

take me as your daughter and do not abandon me

yours Angel

subject: Re: Dear Uncle John
body:
Hello Angel,

It's wonderful to hear from you and I'm sorry to hear about your situation. It sounds like you're going through a tough time. I'm glad that you're trying to continue your education, it's very important.

I understand that you need a guardian for the bank agreement. However, I'm not sure if I can be of much help in this regard. Could you please explain more about what this role entails? What kind of responsibilities would I have as a guardian?

Also, could you tell me more about the bank agreement? How did your father arrange it and why is there an age restriction?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Dear Uncle John
body:
I understand that you need a guardian for the bank agreement. However, I'm not sure if I can be of much help in this regard. Could you please explain more about what this role entails? What kind of responsibilities would I have as a guardian?

Answer > You can be of help in receiving the fund on my behalf before my arrival for the continuation of my school. You get a good school for me, a nursing school because i want to become a nurse. these are the responsibilities.

Also, could you tell me more about the bank agreement? How did your father arrange it and why is there an age restriction?

Answer > The agreement is simple, he did that because of my wicked uncles because if i decide to access the fund at younger age before my graduation i may not handle it. so now that i have decided to leave the country due to pressure which he told the bank, then i should bring a guardian who will guide me through because i am not yet 25.

Angel.

subject: Re: Dear Uncle John
body:
Hello Angel,

Thank you for explaining the situation to me. It sounds like a challenging situation for you, and I admire your determination to pursue nursing. 

Could you please tell me more about how this process works? How would I be able to assist in receiving the fund on your behalf? Also, what are the responsibilities that come with being a guardian in this context?

Furthermore, could you provide more details about the bank agreement? Is there any specific procedure or documentation required from my end?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Dear Uncle John
body:
Could you please tell me more about how this process works? How would I be able to assist in receiving the fund on your behalf? Also, what are the responsibilities that come with being a guardian in this context?

Furthermore, could you provide more details about the bank agreement? Is there any specific procedure or documentation required from my end?


There is nothing else in the process than to send me the following details for
submission at the bank for confirmation that i have found a :guardian and you are the one.

1. Complete Name.........................

2. Complete address....................

3. Telephone number.....................

4. Your age........................... ......

5. occupation..................... ........

Angel

subject: Re: Dear Uncle John
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your response. I'm really interested in understanding more about this process. Could you please elaborate on how I would be able to assist in receiving the fund on your behalf? What are the responsibilities that come with being a guardian in this context?

Also, could you provide more details about the bank agreement? Is there any specific procedure or documentation required from my end?

I'm sorry but I didn't quite understand what you meant by "send me the following details". Could you please clarify that part?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Dear Uncle John
body:
Dear uncle,

Thank you for your response again .

to answer your questions 


Could you please elaborate on how I would be able to assist in receiving the fund on your behalf? What are the responsibilities that come with being a guardian in this context?

Answer > you receive the fund and guide me through in my career, you may buy a big house which will be come a family house for you and your family and me too.
 

Also, could you provide more details about the bank agreement? Is there any specific procedure or documentation required from my end?

Answer> nothing is required except the information i have been asking you. that is below:

1. Complete Name.........................

2. Complete address....................

3. Telephone number.....................

4. Your age........................... ......

5. occupation..................... ........

I'm sorry but I didn't quite understand what you meant by "send me the following details". Could you please clarify that part?

Answer: the following details are below:

1. Complete Name.........................

2. Complete address....................

3. Telephone number.....................

4. Your age........................... ......

5. occupation..................... ........

yours Angel

subject: Re: Dear Uncle John
body:
Dear Uncle,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your willingness to guide me through my career and the idea of a family house sounds wonderful.

However, I'm still a bit unclear about the bank agreement and what exactly is required from me. You mentioned "Complete, Complete, Telephone, Your" but I'm not sure what that means. Could you please explain it in more detail?

Also, when you say "send me the following details", could you specify which details you are referring to? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John
